snippet: The Young Concert Artists showcased three of its gifted musicians — the violinist Bella Hristova, and the pianists Benjamin Moser and Louis Schwizgebel — who played concertos with the Orchestra of St. Luke’s at Alice Tully Hall.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews concert showcasing violinist Bella Hristova and pianists Benjamin Moser and Louis Schwizgebel, accompanied by Orchestra of St Luke's, at Alice Tully Hall as part of its Young Concert Artists series.
lead_paragraph: The Young Concert Artists showcased three of its gifted musicians — the violinist Bella Hristova, and the pianists Benjamin Moser and Louis Schwizgebel — who played concertos with the Orchestra of St. Luke’s at Alice Tully Hall.

headline.seo: Young Concert Artists Gala at Alice Tully Hall
headline.main: Commanding Solos in an Evening of Concertos
headline.print_headline: Commanding Solos in an Evening of Concertos
